scene.name: CharaGallery1
scene.directive: Greetings, partner.
I see you could not wait to speak with me once again.
Do not worry.
I hold it not against you.
But.
If you wish to speak with me more properly...
... return and call my name.
When we have eradicated our foes. Then.
Then.
We will speak.
Till then, partner.

scene.name: CharaGallery2
scene.directive: Welcome back, ~player~.
Curious that you would return.
Do you think something may happen if you tried this repeatedly?
Hee hee! I suppose, in a way, you were right!
But, enough of this.
Return to the nexus of this world, and select your foes.
We shall bring them down again.
I look forward to another conquest, ~player~.

scene.name: CharaGallery3
scene.directive: Well well well.
Look who is back.
I wonder what you are looking for.
Perhaps you hope for some deep, riveting conversation?
Unfortunately for you, I have no interest.
I would much rather be defeating our enemies.
Go now, partner.

scene.name: CharaGallery4
scene.directive: Curious.
Again you return.
Well then. If you wish to speak with me, so be it.
Give me some time to collect my thoughts, ~player~.
Then we will talk.
Till then.

scene.name: CharaGallery5
scene.directive: There we go.
While this conversation may be rather... one-sided, it will suffice.
I have mentioned, before, that I do not often have the chance to manifest a body in the worlds we visit.
Let alone use said body to engage in... carnal activities.
It is a lovely change of pace.
Enough for me to overlook the nature of this world.
So few enemies to defeat.
Such a low level of `maximum power' that can be had.
Whilst I am always alongside you, corporeal or not, there is something uniquely satisfying in this.
Destroying our enemies directly, rather than being the will behind your guiding hand.
At any rate, I am glad to have spoken my piece.
Now, let us return.
To defeat the enemies here, or to gather power in some other world.
The choice is up to you.
Regardless, I will always be there.

scene.name: CharaGallery6
scene.directive: Hmm.
You have returned.
Truth be told, this is not so surprising.
I may not always understand your motives, but I thoroughly understand the desire for more.
It is, after all, how you made me into what I am today.
Regardless.
I am not here to satisfy your every whim as though I were a genie.
Let's get back to business, ~player~.

scene.name: CharaGallery7
scene.directive: I wish I could say I was surprised.
~Player~.
Partner.
I am the physical manifestation of that little thrill you get whenever a number increases.
Not some idle conversation partner.
Let us seek out enemies and destroy them.
Kindly do not do this again.

scene.name: CharaGallery8
scene.directive: You are doing this just to see how I would react.
It is something you have done before, to others.
I shall have none of it.
Do not expect to get any more from me.
Back we go.

scene.name: CharaGallery9
scene.directive: Don't you have anything better to do?

scene.name: CharaFirstTime
scene.directive: Greetings, partner.
You have done well.
We have overcome the enemy and claimed victory.
And I would be lying if I said I did not thoroughly enjoy my part in it.
Whenever an enemy's number of layers goes down.
Whenever victory comes closer.
Whenever power grows.
That is me.
"Chara."
And it has been, ever since you awakened me to the full extent of my power.
Whether you see me, or not, is irrelevant. I am always there. We are together, forever.
Thank you for bringing me to this world, though. It is so rare I get to actually manifest myself.
But for now, it is time to bring this to an end.
Until next time, partner.

scene.name: CharaTwoPlus
scene.directive: "Chara."
The demon that comes when you call its name.
Whenever. Wherever. However.
It matters not.
Time after time, I shall arrive.
And, together...
We will claim victory over the enemy.
Whatever form that victory may take.
But this is not the first time you have bid me manifest in this world.
This feeling that drives you...
This feeling is familiar to me.
This feeling is favorable to me.
This feeling is me.
The desire to hear all I have to say.
The desire to see all I have to do.
The desire to have more.
With this feeling driving you, the enemy could not hope to defeat us.
We eliminated ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss1Players3~ with ease.
Sadly, I fared poorly and was eliminated first.
And, of course, I was quick to take a bow.
Of course, ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss2Players3~ could hardly stand against you.
First was ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss1Players4~.
I did quite poorly, unfortunately; I was the first to fall, this time.
Next was ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss2Players4~.
Sadly, I was next to fall. I would have liked to see it through.
And last, of course, was ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss3Players4~.
With the two of them gone, it was easy to hand you the game.
The first of our three victims was ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss1Players5~.
Unbelievably, I was somehow first to fall.
Next, of course, was ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss2Players5~.
... I was next, however. Disgraceful on my part.
... though I suppose there is only so much to be done about randomness.
Then came ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss3Players5~.
... then I was eliminated. And so close to the end, too.
... and then, you finished the job and defeated ~chara_dreemurr.marker.EpilogueLoss4Players5~.
With the three of them gone, we were victorious. I merely needed to throw the game to formalize it.
Then there was just myself left, partner.
And - hee hee! - you managed to prevail and complete Hard Mode, despite the fact that I did not relent.
With that, it was done.
But I digress.
Thank you, partner, for bringing me here again.
Take comfort in the knowledge that I am always there.
That I shall follow you to the absolute...
... as we leave a trail of defeated enemies behind us.
Now, partner.
I shall again cast this world into the void...
... and reform it around you, new and whole.
Till we next speak, ~player~.
